name: @gamestdio/state-listener
description: Deeply compare JavaScript objects and listen to changes.

scripts.zuul: npm run pretest && zuul --ui mocha-bdd --no-coverage --concurrency 1 -- lib/test/*.js
scripts.zuul-local: npm run pretest && zuul --ui mocha-bdd --no-coverage --concurrency 1 --local 8080 --disable-tunnel -- lib/test/*.js

author: Endel Dreyer
